title: Jack Dorsey’s Former Right-Hand Man Warns Bitcoin Will Crash In Next Financial Crisis
description: Ex-Jack Dorsey associate Mike Brock has warned investors of an imminent Bitcoin crash, predicting a global financial crisis to become the primary trigger.
content: Ex-Jack Dorsey associate Mike Brock has warned investors of an imminent Bitcoin crash, predicting a global financial crisis to become the primary trigger. While Bitcoin has weathered a torrid run in … [+2389 chars]
